articles.title: Oscars apologises to Native American actress Sacheen Littlefeather 50 years after Marlon Brando protest speech - Sky News
articles.content:
The Oscars academy has apologised to a Native American actress who famously took to the stage for Marlon Brando when he won the best actor award in 1973.

articles.title: Series preview: Blue Jays look to turn things around vs. Orioles - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: The Blue Jays still hold the top wild-card spot in the American League, but are just 2.5 games ahead of the surprising Orioles, who are fourth in the race. The top three get playoff spots.
articles.content:
Another series, another key moment in the wild-card race for the Toronto Blue Jays. 
The slumping Blue Jays (61-52) host three games against the Baltimore Orioles (59-55) at Rogers Centre, one week … [+3218 chars]

articles.title: Lawyers for U.S. basketball star Brittney Griner appeal Russian prison sentence - CBC Sports
articles.description: Lawyers for American basketball star Brittney Griner on Monday filed an appeal against her nine-year Russian prison sentence for drug possession, Russian news agencies reported Monday.
articles.content: Lawyers for American basketball star Brittney Griner have filed an appeal of her nine-year Russian prison sentence for drug possession, Russian news agencies reported Monday, amid talks between the U… [+2621 chars]

articles.title: Feathers May Have Helped Dinosaurs Beat Cold - Asian Scientist Magazine
articles.description: Traditionally understood as warm-loving animals, dinosaurs lived and thrived in the arctic, suggest a study by Chinese and American researchers.
